Package io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans

Class ContentBean

java.lang.Object
io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans.ContentBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named @SessionScoped public class ContentBean extends Object implements Serializable
Supplies additional content for records (such contents produced by the crowdsourcing module).
See Also:
